name: Prototype - On Hold
description:
Hey, this is my first ever 3D project and second ever game, I've only recently got into game development and coding and I've spent a decent amount of time since the release of my last game (DogeCoin Clicker) making this prototype for a Third Person Shooter. I've worked pretty hard on it and I know it's really rough but I'm pretty proud of it not sure what to do next with it planning to add a couple levels and some guns but will take alot longer than my clicker game, we'll see what happens!

Currently on hold, my devlog goes further into this.
